desktopView

Class ColorImg

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprite.Img
      • desktopView.ColorImg

  • public class ColorImg
extends Img
    Stores a width x height square with a 32 bit ARGB value.
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorImg(int iColor, int width, int height)
      Create a colored image with the specified dimension and the ARGB 32 bit color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorImg

        public ColorImg(int iColor,
        int width,
        int height)
        Create a colored image with the specified dimension and the ARGB 32 bit color.
        Parameters:
        iColor - The 32 bit color defined by 0xAARRGGBB
        width - The width of the image.
        height - THe height of the image.

      • getRotatedInstance

        public Img getRotatedInstance(int degree)
        Description copied from class: Img
        Creates a copy of the image rotated by the specified number of degrees. Instead of rotating an image on the fly this method can be used to pre-rotate images.
        Specified by:
        getRotatedInstance in class Img
        Parameters:
        degree - The amount to rotate out of 360 degrees
        Returns:
        A rotated copy.
